marklogic.body: This is getting a bit silly. The first incident I could still believe, but this last one I would say is someone jumping on the band wagon hoping to get something out of it. Firstly when someone is working out, chances that there spit would be a Cold liquid is highly unlikely. I would say this was one of those steroid monkeys lifting half a car. Those guys often spit, growl and drop weights indiscriminately. I don't agree with it but I wont go calling it a racist attack. I have never been at a VA where there is a divide between black and white, I Always found it quite socially mixed.
